Communications and IT

Rostelcom conducted a fast-track Internet in the private sector of Tamala

10.01.24 16:09

Rostelcom has completed the construction of a modern private sector communications network for the Tamala Penza region. This is reflected in a report from the operator ' s press service to PenzaNews.

In 2023, Rostelcom provided mobile communications to 28 small population centres in the Penza region

25.12.23 13:01

In 2023, Rostelcom provided 28 small settlements in the Penza region with a cellular connection of standard 4G/LTE as part of the second phase of the federal project " Digital Inequities " .

MegaFon has expanded the LTE network in 36 small settlements in the Penza region

21.12.23 14:20

MegaFon has expanded the LTE network in 36 small townships in the Penza region, and 95,000 villagers have accessed high-speed Internet. This is reflected in a report from the operator ' s press service to PenzaNews.

Rostelek built an optical network in Bekovo

15.12.23 10:41

Rostelcom launched an optical network in the neighbourhoods of the private construction of the Bekovo Penza district working settlement, 2,000,462 families received access to the fast Internet and digital services. That's what the operator's press service reported to the IA...

Rostelcom broadcasted a direct line with the Penzen Governor on regional television channels.

08.12.23 12:19

Rostelcom broadcasted a direct line on regional television channels with Oleg Melnichenko, Governor of Penza province, which was held on Thursday, 7 December. That's what the operator's press service said,

MegaFon updated television equipment at the Chern

06.12.23 11:54

MegaFon has installed new telecom equipment in the city of Zaren province. This is reflected in a report from the operator ' s press service to PenzaNews.

Rostelcom announced the launch of a competition for journalists and bloggers on the digital future.

14.11.23 12:33

Rostelek announced the launch of the XIII digital future contest, which was attended by regional journalists and bloggers, including from the Penzen region.

Rostelek built the Ramzai Optical Network

31.10.23 12:33

Rostelek built an optical network in the village of Ramzai of the Mokshan district of Penza province, 546 families received access to the fast Internet and modern digital services. This is reflected in a report from the operator ' s press service to PenzaNews.

Rostelcom has upgraded the optical data transmission network in 50 multi-family Penza houses since the beginning of the year

30.10.23 11:19

Rostelcoma has been upgraded since the beginning of 2023 to an optical data transmission network in 50 multi-family houses in Penza, setting up switches with hygabit ports of Internet access. That's what the press service said...

The MTS provided a fast-track Internet to the Penzen planetarium

23.10.23 12:12

The digital ecosystem of the MTS provided the velocity Internet with the pencil planetarium, which was opened after the reconstruction in early September. This is reflected in the company ' s press service at PenzaNews.

Actual
  • In Mokshan and Kuznetsk areas, command-and-control anti-terrorist trainings were conducted

  • Oleg Melnichenko promised to eliminate housing for orphans by 2025.
  • More than 200 presentations were made by the Penzen Prosecutor ' s Office on inadequate maintenance of roads during the winter period
  • Melnichenko reported on the prospects for the construction of an oncodispenser surgical hull between 2025 and 2026

  • Igor Komarov and Oleg Melnichenko discussed the socio-economic development of the Penzen region
  • Komarov and Melnichenko participated in the opening of the oncodispenser laboratory and diagnostic body
  • Another consignment of humanitarian cargo is shipped from the Penzen region to the SSS area
  • Four violations of forest law have been detected in the Penzen region in a week
  • A tactical-special anti-terrorist training was conducted in Penza
  • In the Penzen Region, a prompt and preventive exercise was conducted to detect violations of migration legislation
  • Vladimir Mutovkin congratulated scientists on the professional holiday.
  • A " federal road " event will take place in the Pennsentiary Region
  • Oleg Melnichenko congratulated scientists on Russian Science Day.
  • Specialists began constructing the blood of a building culture in Middle Eluzani
  • The Penzen region forecasts yellow weather hazards
  • Gazelle Next and heavy loads, one of the drivers hospitalized in the Nizhnem district
  • In Wadinsk, command and control training was conducted
  • In Nikolsk, the fire took the life of an old woman.
  • In the Penza region, a total of 982,000 square metres of housing is planned for 2024.
  • FSB detained a Penny resident who persuaded the enterprise ' s CEO to transfer 60 million roubles to protect against the " raid "
  • Oleg Melnichenko has commissioned a five-year plan to develop linear communications in Penze
  • In the Penza region, a 50,000 roubles were fined by a municipal official for insulting a subordinate
  • On the edge of the Penza, the lung broke into the light support, the driver was injured.
  • In Penza, a man stole a museum from his rented apartment, two supplies and two remotes to buy alcohol.
  • Consolidated budget of the Penzen Region on income for 2023 was executed by 102.6 per cent
  • Repair of the road -- Telešovka-Pana -- will begin in April
  • 75,000 cubic metres of snow were removed from the Penza streets during the weekend
  • In the Pennsentiary Region, 11 schools are scheduled to be renovated in 2024 under the " School Modification " programme
  • Toyota Camry and Kamaz faced the Toyota Camry in the Basin region, two people killed
  • In three days, 31 non-resident drivers were detained on penzen roads
  • In the city area, two people have been killed in fire
  • Penza ' s resident lost more than 8 million roubles, believing telephone frauds.
  • A resident of the Kamen district who was repaid on drunk driving received 240 hours of compulsory work and lost his vehicle
  • A " carrier " prophylactic event will be held in the Penzen region
  • Criminal proceedings against hooliganism have been instituted in the Penza region for the beating of a 19-year-old orphan.
  • Oleg Melnichenko congratulated the inhabitants of the region on the 85th anniversary of the Penza region
